remarks: Double restricted quantification with restricted existential uniqueness and restricted "at most one.", analogous to ~ 2eumo .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 24-Jun-2017.)
statement:
2reurmo $p |- ( E! x e. A E* y e. B ph -> E* x e. A E! y e. B ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d x y $.
